Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Bay City in 1978...
Injured on 7/29/1978 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1980, off Antonio Sanchez (CBC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1980, off James Wines (CBC)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1981, hitting .368 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston (FBA) on 6/12/1982...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1982, hitting .323 with 5 HR, 25 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1982...
